turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would that be at starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Yes, it will be Starbucks on 4th.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said 4th street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 4th Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, and you said you wanted a caffe latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Caramel Brulée Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so you are ordering a grande caramel brulee latte with 2% milk and whipped cream, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to your preferred store, one moment please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a grande caramel brulee latte with 2% milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks on 4th street in colorado springs, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's wonderful. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your coffee.
